Content_wSideColumn.Name: Evaluate Your Intern
Content_wSideColumn.Title: Evaluate Your Intern
Content_wSideColumn.Abstract: Where to complete evaluations for your BYU-Idaho intern.

MoveLeft.label: Toggle column right or left (right is default)

fbookTop.label: Put facebook at top of page

fbookDisplayed.label: Number of facebook messages to display

Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Evaluations are completed in Career Navigator.

Once you have logged in, click Evaluate My Intern in the Quick Links menu. Your intern should be on the next page, with an Evaluate Student button.

Trouble-shooting Internship Evaluations

  • If the quick link doesn't work, please notify our office.
  • If your intern's name does not appear,
    • Click the clear button to refresh the screen.
    • Ensure the scheduled end date is within two weeks. You will receive an email two weeks before the end date to notify you the evaluation is available. If you haven't received the email yet, this could be the issue.
    • Ensure hiring supervisor hasn't changed. Evaluations are linked to the supervisor that the student listed when they registered the internship. Perhaps another person hired the intern, but you are supervising them.

If you are still experiencing difficulties, please contact our office and we will make any necessary changes so you can complete your evaluation.
